main_title: The Day Bees Stole a Baseball Game
hook: [excited] Imagine the crack of the bat, the cheers of the crowd, thenâ€”chaos! In 1976, a swarm of bees descended on a baseball game in Massachusetts, turning America's favorite pastime into a frantic escape.
description: In 1976, a bee swarm disrupted a baseball game in Massachusetts, leading to chaos and a temporary suspension. #Baseball #Bees #History
